@graph.name: Optizen AI Feature Request System
@graph.description: Interactive feature request submission system for Optizen AI users to propose new functionality, enhancements, and improvements to the AI-powered optimization platform.
@graph.browserRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled

potentialAction.name: Submit Feature Request
potentialAction.description: Submit enhancement requests for Optizen AI

@graph.name: How to Submit Optizen AI Feature Requests
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to submitting feature enhancement requests for Optizen AI platform

supply.name: Optizen AI user account or experience

step.name: Access Feature Request Form
step.text: Navigate to the Optizen AI feature request page and locate the submission form

step.name: Describe Your Feature Request
step.text: Fill in the form with detailed information about the desired AI enhancement or new functionality

step.name: Specify Use Case
step.text: Explain how the requested feature would improve your Optizen AI workflow or solve specific problems

step.name: Submit Request
step.text: Complete and submit your feature request for review by the Optizen AI development team

mainEntity.name: What types of features can I request for Optizen AI?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can request AI optimization enhancements, new analysis capabilities, integration features, user interface improvements, reporting functionalities, and workflow automation features for Optizen AI.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take for feature requests to be reviewed?

acceptedAnswer.text: Feature requests are typically reviewed within 1-2 weeks. Implementation timelines vary based on complexity, user demand, and development priorities.

mainEntity.name: Will I be notified about the status of my feature request?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, users are notified about feature request status updates, including acceptance for development roadmap or implementation completion.

mainEntity.name: Can I request integrations with other tools?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely! Integration requests with third-party tools, APIs, and platforms are welcome and help expand Optizen AI's ecosystem capabilities.

@graph.name: Optizen AI Feature Requests
@graph.description: Submit feature requests and enhancement suggestions for Optizen AI platform

hasDefinedTerm.name: Feature Request
hasDefinedTerm.description: A formal proposal for new functionality or enhancement to be added to Optizen AI platform

hasDefinedTerm.name: AI Enhancement
hasDefinedTerm.description: Improvements to artificial intelligence capabilities, algorithms, or machine learning models within Optizen AI

hasDefinedTerm.name: User Feedback
hasDefinedTerm.description: Input from Optizen AI users regarding desired features, improvements, or functionality changes

hasDefinedTerm.name: Development Roadmap
hasDefinedTerm.description: Planned timeline and priorities for implementing new features and enhancements in Optizen AI

@graph.name: Feature Request Use Cases
@graph.description: Common scenarios and applications for submitting Optizen AI feature requests

itemListElement.name: AI Algorithm Enhancement Requests
itemListElement.description: Request improvements to existing AI optimization algorithms or suggest new machine learning approaches

itemListElement.name: Integration Feature Proposals
itemListElement.description: Suggest new integrations with third-party tools, APIs, or platforms to expand Optizen AI capabilities

itemListElement.name: User Interface Improvements
itemListElement.description: Propose enhancements to dashboard design, navigation, or user experience elements

itemListElement.name: Reporting and Analytics Features
itemListElement.description: Request new reporting capabilities, data visualization options, or analytics functionalities

itemListElement.name: Workflow Automation Requests
itemListElement.description: Suggest automation features to streamline repetitive tasks and improve operational efficiency

itemListElement.name: Performance Optimization Suggestions
itemListElement.description: Propose improvements to system performance, processing speed, or resource utilization
